metadata.title: CVE-2014-8104 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenVPN 2.x before 2.0.11, 2.1.x, 2.2.x before 2.2.3, and 2.3.x before2.3.6 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service(server crash) via a small control channel packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8104` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.3.2-7ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.2-7ubuntu3.1').
